identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a construction marketplace that feels like a high-end architectural magazine, not a generic directory.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Style precision with Organic Home warmth.
Emotion First: Trust and Craftsmanship over speed.
Content is King: Show the work (images), don't just list skills.
Contrast: Clear visual separation between 'Particulier' (Warm) and 'Pro' (Cool).

theme.strategy: Light mode primarily to convey cleanliness and renovation. Dark mode optional but secondary.

secondary.name: Clay Terracotta
secondary.usage: B2C/Particulier Accents, 'Get a Quote' CTAs, Highlights

mono.usage: SIRET numbers, Technical specs, Code snippets.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on solid backgrounds to add 'materiality'.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'layered' shadows: shadow-sm for resting, shadow-xl for hovering.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 for sticky headers and floating action bars.

hero.alt: Architect reviewing blueprints in a modern office

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-trust marketplace. Avoid generic 'SaaS' vibes. Think 'Architectural Digest' meets 'Airbnb'.

pages.landing: Use a split-screen hero or a heavy bento grid. Do not use a simple centered hero. Show the 'Particulier' vs 'Pro' paths clearly.
pages.search: Implement a map-based search layout. Use a sticky map on the right (desktop) and list on the left.
pages.profile: The professional's profile is their portfolio. Give images maximum real estate.

instructions_to_main_agent.auth: Create distinct flows for 'Particulier' (Simple, Social Login) and 'Pro' (SIRET verification step).
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: Keep it clean. Use 'Manrope' for headings. Use the 'Structural Slate' color for the sidebar.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
